item.description: Getting Started Install the ProcessMaker community edition Get the Business Process Automation with ProcessMaker 3.1: A Beginnerâ€™s Guide by Dipo Majekodunmi on Amazon

item.title: Insert Page Break in Outputdoc
item.description: Inserting Page Breaks in Output Document

item.title: Filter and Sort Grid
item.description: Filter and Sort Grids This is a list of helpful links to help you with Dynaform Grids An answer on the ProcessMaker forum on how to set filtering on grids ProcessMaker wiki guide to using DataTables in ProcessMaker Sort grid by clicking header An answer on the ProcessMaker forum on how to use ParamQuery Sort grid by column

item.title: Tabs in Processmaker
item.description: How to create tabs in ProcessMaker Dynaform Medium article by Dipo Majekodunmi

item.title: Display Loading Effect
item.description: How to display loading effect in a Dynaform Medium article by Dipo Majekodunmi

item.title: Disable Grid Column
item.description: Disable a grid column function disableGridColumn(gridId, gridColumnId) { let gridRows = $("#" + gridId).getNumberRows(); for (i = 1; i <= gridRows; i++) { $("#form\\[" + gridId + "\\]\\[" +i+ "\\]\\[" + gridColumnId + "\\]").attr("disabled", true); } }

item.title: Enable Grid Column
item.description: Enable a grid column function enableGridColumn(gridId, gridColumnId) { let gridRows = $("#" + gridId).getNumberRows(); for (i = 1; i <= gridRows; i++) { $("#form\\[" + gridId + "\\]\\[" +i+ "\\]\\[" + gridColumnId + "\\]").attr("disabled", false); } } function enableGridColumn(gridId, gridColumnId) { let numberOfGrid = $("#" + gridId).getNumberRows(); for (let index = 1; index <= numberOfGrid; index++) { $("#" + gridId).find("#"+ gridId +"-body").find("#form\\["+ gridId +"\\]\\[" + index + "\\]\\["+ gridColumnId +"\\]").prop("disabled", false); } }

item.title: Is Grid Column Empty?
item.description: Check if a Grid column is empty function isGridColumnEmpty (gridId, rowNo, columnNo) { if (!($("#" + gridId).getValue(rowNo, columnNo) != '')) { return [false, columnNo]; } return [true, columnNo]; }

item.title: Show Grid Column
item.description: Show a grid column function showGridColumn(gridId, index) { $("#" + gridId).showColumn(index); $("#" + gridId).enableValidation(index); }

item.title: Hide Grid Column
item.description: Hide a grid column function hideGridColumn(gridId, index) { $("#" + gridId).hideColumn(index); $("#" + gridId).disableValidation(index); }

item.title: Clear Grid
item.description: Clear a grid function clearGrid(gridId) { return $("#" + gridId ).clear(); }

item.title: Allow Only Numbers in Textbox
item.description: Allow only numbers in textbox function allowOnlyNumbers(elementid){ $("#" + elementid).getControl().keypress( function() { $(this).val($(this).val().replace(/[^\d].+/, "")); if ((event.which < 48 || event.which > 57)) { event.preventDefault(); } }); }

item.title: Disable Textbox
item.description: Disable textbox function disableElement(elementId) { $("#" + elementId).attr('disabled', 'disabled'); }

item.title: Enable Textbox
item.description: Enable textbox function enableElement(elementId) { $("#" + elementId).removeAttr('disabled'); }

item.title: Get Textbox Value
item.description: Get the value of a textbox function fetchValue(elementid) { return $("#" + elementid).getValue(); }

item.title: Check if Texbox Is Equal
item.description: Check if the value of two textboxes are the same function isSame(element1, element2) { let val1 = $("#" + element1).getValue(); let val2 = $("#" + element2).getValue(); return (val1 == val2); }

item.title: Assign Value to Textbox
item.description: Assign a value to a textbox function assignValue(elementid, value) { return $("#" + elementid).setValue(value); }

item.title: Show and Assign to Textbox
item.description: Show and assign a value to a textbox function showandAssignValue(element, value) { return $('#' + element).show().setValue(value); }

item.title: Disable Textbox Validation
item.description: Disable validation on textbox function unrequireElement(elementid) { return $("#" + elementid).disableValidation(); } You have to make the form control required in order to be able to disableValidation dynamically

item.title: Enable Textbox Validation
item.description: Enable validation on textbox function requireElement(elementid) { return $("#" + elementid).enableValidation(); } You have to make the form control required in order to be able to enableValidation dynamically

item.title: Hide Multiple Fields
item.description: Hide multiple form fields //this accepts an array of textbox ids function hideMultipleElements(arrInput) { arrInput.forEach(hideElementId); function hideElementId(item, index) { return $("#" + item ).hide(); } }

item.title: Show Multiple Fields
item.description: Show multiple form fields //this accepts an array of textbox ids function showMultipleElements(arrInput) { arrInput.forEach(showElementId); function showElementId(item, index) { return $("#" + item ).show(); } }

item.title: Hide Textbox
item.description: Hide a form field function hideElement(elementid) { return $("#" + elementid).disableValidation().hide(); }

item.title: Show Textbox
item.description: Show textbox function showElement(elementid, validate = "no") { if (validate == "yes") return $("#" + elementid).enableValidation().show(); return $("#" + elementid).show(); }

item.title: Check if Empty
item.description: Check if a form field is empty function isEmpty(elementid) { if($("#" + elementid).getValue() == '' ) return true; return false; }

item.title: Empty Textbox
item.description: Empty a textbox field function setEmpty(elementid) { return $("#" + elementid).setValue(''); }

item.title: Disable Grid
item.description: Disable a grid function disableGrid(elementid) { return $("#" + elementid).find("input,button,textarea,select").attr("disabled", true); }

item.title: Disable Form
item.description: How disable all the fields on the Dynaform $("form").find(".form-control").prop("disabled", true);

item.title: Hide Prev Next Button
item.description: How to hide the prev and next button on a Dynaform $("#dyn_backward").hide(); $("img[src='/images/bulletButtonLeft.gif']").hide(); $("#dyn_forward").hide(); $("img[src='/images/bulletButton.gif']").hide();
